summary: A test suite that validates the behavior of the Qiskit directed‑acyclic‑graph (DAG) drawing utility, checking that generated files follow naming conventions, have correct extensions, accept only supported styles, handle cases without quantum registers, and correctly represent DAG dependencies.
business_intent: Guarantee that the DAG visualization feature works reliably in production, preventing file‑naming errors, unsupported style usage, and missing‑register issues, thereby improving developer confidence and end‑user experience when visualizing quantum circuits.
